entry.title: Turquoise Stretch Spandex Folding Chair Cover with Metallic Glittering Back
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2120
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 3.59 - 990.84 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover
Front Material: 4-way Stretch Spandex
Back Material: Glitter Stretch Spandex
Color: Turquoise
Top-Bottom Chair Height: 36"
Chair Width: 16"
Note: Will not fit banquet style chairs or the larger LIFETIME folding style chairs.
There are pockets on chair cover for chair legs.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]


 

Spandex Banquet Chair Cover

Combining the seamless luster of premium quality spandex with the glamorous glint of metallic glitter, these four-way stretchable chair covers will ooze timeless elegance and regal appeal to your party space. This stylish duo of sleek stretch spandex front and glitzy glittered back will instantly add a “wow” factor to your party ambiance.

Durable and Reusable

Besides being dreamily dazzling, these heavy-duty chair covers are equally affordable, reusable, and durable. The attributes of stain and wrinkle resistance make these fab covers a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations.

  
 

Multi-Use

Create a perfectly dashing duet of glimmer and glamour by complementing these glistening spandex chair covers with our spandex chair sashes and caps in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc. 

 

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • Uses: Party Chair Covers, Banquet Chair Covers, Wedding Chair Covers, Dining Chair Covers

[Information]

Satin Folding Chair Covers

Our supreme quality satin folding chair covers are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind chair decoration for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment. Spread these shimmering chair covers on your drab and plain party chairs to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe at such a festal decoration.

Elegant & Stylish

Create an exotic party ambiance by pairing with satin tablecloths, table runners, table skirts, backdrops, aisle runners, favor supplies, and napkins. Accentuate these glistening covers with Rosette or Spandex Chair Sashes, Chair Belts, Chair Ties, Chair Caps, Chair Bows, Chair sash buckles and pins.

Multi-Use

Get inspired by these satin folding chair covers as it adds a class to your simple celebration. Perfect for weddings, showers, anniversaries, sweet 16, quinceanera, birthdays, and other festive celebrations. From the extensive array of colors, you can pick the perfect hue to coordinate with your party theme color.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration 
  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water

entry.title: Ivory Premium Spandex Scuba Folding Chair Covers
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2120
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 3.48

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover 
Material: Polyester & Cotton Blend
Color: Ivory
Top to Bottom Height: 40"

Chair Seat: 19" length x 18" width
Chair Legs: 18" height (from ground)
Thickness: 220 GSM
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Scuba Folding Chair Covers

Scuba chair covers are a perfect choice to dress your banquet or party chairs in an upscale manner. Made from the combination of Poly and Cotton, these flexible chair covers can fit a broad range of chair sizes and shapes.

Sturdy and Durable

The attribute of wrinkle-resistant and 2-way horizontal stretch make these premium quality chair covers a durable, reusable, and affordable choice for decorating and accenting.

Multi-Use

Give your party space a upscale feel by adding your party chairs up with these chic stretchable scuba chair covers. Enhance their elegance with chair sashes, chair belts, chair ties, chair sash rhinestone buckles, chair bows, flowers, laces, trims, and flowers.

 

Additional Information:

  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration 
  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • Note: Fits standard folding style chairs. Will not fit banquet style or larger LIFETIME folding chairs.
  • 2 way Stretch. ( stretches horizontally) So even if your chair is 2-3" wider than our listed sizes, this cover will fit it.
